item.title: Fire Danger Ratings for 12 October 2023
item.description:
Content:

The following alert has been issued by the Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES).

Time of issue: 04:16 PM
Date of issue: 11 October 2023

High Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 12 October 2023:

  • Central Pilbara
  • Burrup
  • Ashburton Inland
  • Ashburton Coast
  • Exmouth Gulf Coast
  • Gascoyne Coast
  • Gascoyne Inland
  • Yalgar
  • North Goldfields
  • West Interior
  • Central Interior
  • South Interior
  • Midwest Coast
  • Midwest Inland
  • Lesueur
  • Yarra Yarra
  • Mortlock


You can find the four-day Fire Danger Rating forecast, which Local Government Authorities are affected and relevant community safety messages on Emergency WA

END
Media Contact: DFES Media and Corporate Communications on 9395 9543.

item.title: Fire Danger Ratings for 11 October 2023
item.description:
Content:

The following alert has been issued by the Department of Fire and Emergency Services (DFES).

Time of issue: 04:41 AM
Date of issue: 11 October 2023

High Fire Danger Ratings have been forecast for the following Fire Weather Districts for 11 October 2023:

  • Burrup

  • Exmouth Gulf Coast

  • South Interior

  • Midwest Inland
